Test.TestName: START AND STOP MULTICAST STREAMING – G.726 (IPv4, ONLY AUDIO PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response(except streaming)with one ASC, one AEC
Test.Description: CreateProfile - OK DUT returns one ASC in GetAudioSourceConfigurations response There is compataible AEC

Test.TestName: START AND STOP MULTICAST STREAMING – G.726 (IPv4, ONLY AUDIO PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response(except streaming)with one ASC, several ASC
Test.Description: CreateProfile - OK DUT returns one ASC in GetAudioSourceConfigurations response DUT returns several ASC in GetCompatibleAudioEncoderConfigurations without required codec Required AEC was found for the first AEC

Test.TestName: START AND STOP MULTICAST STREAMING – G.726 (IPv4, ONLY AUDIO PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response(except streaming)with one ASC, several ASC-2
Test.Description: CreateProfile - OK DUT returns one ASC in GetAudioSourceConfigurations response DUT returns several ASC in GetCompatibleAudioEncoderConfigurations without required codec Required codec was not found for the first AEC Required codec was found for the second AEC

Test.TestName: START AND STOP MULTICAST STREAMING – G.726 (IPv4, ONLY AUDIO PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response(except streaming) several ASCs
Test.Description: CreateProfile - OK DUT returns several ASCs in GetAudioSourceConfigurations response Required codec is not found for the first ASC Required codec is found for the second ASC

Test.TestName: START AND STOP MULTICAST STREAMING – G.726 (IPv4, ONLY AUDIO PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response(except streaming)- Annex A.2 with profile deletion
Test.Description: CreateProfile - not OK Profile for deletion - OK. Deleted Profile has no ASC, AEC DUT returns one ASC in GetAudioSourceConfigurations response There is compataible AEC

Test.TestName: START AND STOP MULTICAST STREAMING – G.726 (IPv4, ONLY AUDIO PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response(except streaming)- Annex A.2 with profile deletion-2
Test.Description: Test checks recovery procedure for deleted profile. Profile had VSC, VEC, ASC, AEC CreateProfile - not OK Profile for deletion - OK. DUT returns one ASC in GetAudioSourceConfigurations response There is compataible AEC

Test.TestName: START AND STOP MULTICAST STREAMING – G.726 (IPv4, ONLY AUDIO PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response(except streaming)- Annex A.2: all profiles are fixed
Test.Description:
Annex A.2: CreateProfile - not OK Profile for deletion - not OK (all profiles are fixed)
DUT returns one ASC in GetAudioSourceConfigurations response There is compataible AEC

Test.TestName: START AND STOP MULTICAST STREAMING – G.726 (IPv4, ONLY AUDIO PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response(except streaming)- Annex A.2: all profiles are fixed-2
Test.Description:
Annex A.2: CreateProfile - not OK Profile for deletion - not OK (all profiles are fixed) All profiles have VSC, ASC, VEC, AEC
There is compataible AEC

Test.TestName: START AND STOP MULTICAST STREAMING – G.726 (IPv4, ONLY AUDIO PROFILE)
Test.Name: Incorrect response- no required codec
Test.Description: CreateProfile - OK DUT returns one ASC in GetAudioSourceConfigurations response DUT returns several ASC in GetCompatibleAudioEncoderConfigurations without required codec Required AEC was not found

Test.TestName: START AND STOP MULTICAST STREAMING – G.726 (IPv4, ONLY AUDIO PROFILE)
Test.Name: Annex A.2 with profile deletion - no profiles
Test.Description: Incorrect response CreateProfile - not OK DUT returns no profiles

Test.TestName: START AND STOP MULTICAST STREAMING – G.726 (IPv4, ONLY AUDIO PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response(except streaming)- Annex A.2 with profile deletion (other fault on CreateProfile)
Test.Description: CreateProfile - not OK, other fault Profile for deletion - OK. Deleted Profile has no ASC, AEC DUT returns one ASC in GetAudioSourceConfigurations response There is compataible AEC
